divs: Sighting DetailsWe were hiking in the desert hills on Saugus. The sky was cloudy Cristinatripped. She looked up and saw a blue thing falling. She quickly moved out ofthe way. We thought it was a ball, but it was way too big. The blue bubblyobject fell and bounced back up to the sky never to return again. We normally donot believe in things of this nature but we believe what we see with our owneyes.
